content: Hello, I am displaying a list of patient resource on UI for every patient I want to show that patient has an alert or not, but in patient resource there is no field related to Alert(Flag), to achieve that If I use extension will it be compliant with FHIR model ??

It would be better to just do a reverse-include on Alert as part of your patient query. That's going to be easier to maintain and will be more broadly supported/recognized. That said, returning an extension wouldn't technically be non-conformant.
